DESCRIPTION:

famous strategy of "Behind Enemy Lines 2: Storm" offers a new single player mode , in which you will take part in a variety of military operations - from the grand tank battles to covert sniper sabotage. In multiplayer, you will be able to compete against rivals in the new multiplayer maps formats from "1 to 1 " to " 4 by 4 ". A new command mode for 16 participants (" 8 by 8 ") would test their skills in large-scale and spectacular battles on huge , detailed maps. Also available new types of camouflage , which vary depending on the time of year and the type of terrain on the battlefield.
